text.div: • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActClass where concept is-a CACT

name: ActClassControlAct
title: ActClassControlAct
description: An act representing a system action such as the change of state of another act or the initiation of a query. All control acts represent trigger events in the HL7 context. ControlActs may occur in different moods.
